definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.chinese: 你船将在协调世界时0920时靠泊。

sentences.english: Your berth will be clear at 0830 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 你的泊位将在协调世界时0830时清爽。

sentences.english: You have permission to anchor at 0900 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 允许你船在协调世界时0900时抛锚。
预计协调世界时0900时出现海啸。

sentences.english: Chief Engineer, please standby engine by 1600 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 轮机长，请在协调世界时1600时前备车。
在协调世界时0930时开始过运河。
你船可以在协调世界时0900时续航。
协调世界时0930恢复船上日常工作。

sentences.english: We start radar search at 0830 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 我们从协调世界时0830时开始雷达搜寻。

sentences.english: You will join convoy at 0800 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 在协调世界时0800时你船加入过运河编队。

sentences.english: Do not pass report point "C" until 0800 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 不要在协调世界时0800时以前通过报告点“C”。
你必须在协调世界时0930时抛锚。

sentences.english: Third Officer, please inform Chief Engineer of standby engine by 1500 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 三副，请通知轮机长在协调世界时1500时备车。

sentences.english: You will enter canal at 1200 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 你船将在协调世界时1200时进运河。

sentences.english: Coordinated Universal Time coincides with winter time in London.
sentences.chinese: 而协调世界时恰好与伦敦的冬令时相吻合。
你将在协调世界时0700时靠泊。

pinyin: Ge2 lin2 ni2 zhi4 Biao1 zhun3 shi2 jian1
Ge2 lin2 wei1 zhi4 Biao1 zhun3 shi2 jian1

definition: the sidereal year (astronomy)/the year defined in terms of the fixed stars
perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis
aphelion, the furthest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/opposite: perihelion 近日點|近日点[jin4 ri4 dian3]/higher apsis
